section.p: You hurry forward with your men, but instead of gold you find only a heap of old polished brass.
'Nice of you to drop in,' says a voice.
You whirl around. Hanging head-down from the ceiling of the tunnel is a long learn vampire wrapped in a black shroud. He reaches out with thin arms to clutch his victims: you and your shipmates!
Only if you defeat the vampire can you get past its dangling carcass and leave - .
